title-group.article-title: Wordsworth, Coleridge, Dora, and the Meuse-Rhine Tour of 1828

ref.mixed-citation: Manuscripts: Coleridge, Samuel Taylor. Notebook 40. British Library, London. Add MS 47535. Wordsworth, Dora. Journal of a Tour on the Continent, 1828. Dove Cot- tage Library, Grasmere ("DCL"). MS 110 (formerly listed as "Journal 30").

-.Journal, 14 July-5 Au- gust 1828. E.J. Pratt Library, Victoria College, Toronto ("VUL"). MS LT 80. Dendurent, item 265; described as "Diary of Rhine Tour, 14 July-5 August. 2 ff. Tran- scribed in an unknown hand."

Byatt, A.S. Wordsworth and Coleridge in their time. London: Nelson, 1970.
Coleridge, Samuel Taylor. Collected Letters. Ed. Earl Leslie Griggs. 6 vols. Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1956-1971. Cited as CL.
-. Complete Poetical Works. Ed. E.H. Coleridge. 2 vols. Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1912. Cited as CPW.

— =. Lectures 1808-1819 on Literature. Ed. R.A. Foakes. Collected Coleridge, Bollingen Series LXXV, volume 5. 2 vols. London and Princeton: Roudedge and Kegan Paul and Princeton University Press, 1987. Cited as Lects 1808-1819.

-. Shorter Works and Fragments. Ed. H.J. Jackson and J.R. de J. Jackson. Collected Coleridge, Bollingen Series LXXV, volume 11.2 vols. London and Princeton: Roudedge and Kegan Paul and Princeton University Press, 1995. Cited as SWäfF.

-. Coler- idge: Darker Reflections. London: HarperCollins, 1998. Cited as Holmes CDR.

worth: A Biography. Vol. 2: The Later Years: 1803-1850. Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1965. Cited as WWLY.
